overview: Motivational speaker and best-selling author Andy Andrews explores what it really takes to become happy and successful in this PBS special recorded before a live audience at the Ryman Auditorium in Nashville, Tenn. Using anecdotes along with a healthy dose of humor, Andy conveys the inspiring message of his book &NFi;The Traveler's Gift: Seven Decisions That Determine Personal Success&NFi_; through a medium ideally suited to his storytelling talents.
title: Andy Andrews: The Seven Decisions
